Summary: Q113 and Q114 buses are detoured in both directions because of a community event taking place along Mott Ave between Central and Cornaga Aves.
Description:
Q113 and Q114 buses are detoured in both directions because of a community event taking place along Mott Ave between Central and Cornaga Aves.
While detoured, northbound Q113 and Q114 buses will not service stops from Cornaga Ave/Rose St to Mott Ave/Central Ave.

Southbound Q113 buses will not service stops from Mott Ave/Beach 20th St to Mott Ave/Cornaga Ave.

Southbound Q114 buses will not service stops along Mott Ave at Cornaga Ave or Neilson St.

Stops will be made, as requested, in both directions along Beach 9th St.

Click here to view a map of this detour.

Note: Bus arrival information may be inaccurate or unavailable while buses are detoured.
